title: Wish You Luck
synopsis:
Animated music video for Peaky P-key's song Wish You Luck. The track is apart of their first single release "Peak Peaky&Peaky!!" and was also used as an insert song in the final episode of the D4DJ First Mix anime.

This music video initially released on the official D4DJ Channel's YouTube, but was re-uploaded again with a CM recut on October 23, 2020. It was later published standalone also through D4DJ's Global Channel on January 6, 2021.

(Source: AniList)
